text:
Team, Good afternoon π
Today, I walked all rooms on 9th Floor and cleanliness has improved a lot, THANK YOU SO MUCH for all your effort. However, I also noticed some areas for improvement that are just as important as the cleanliness and should be addressed: Room Presentation in general.
We will discuss this in detail on Sunday October 6TH, in Brian Office at 9:30 to 10:30 AM during a supervisors meeting. The purpose of this meeting is to provide feedback, identify points to improvement, share techniques that might work for you, and other related topics. This has been a wonderful year, full of challenges and opportunities, and I want us to finish the las three months of the year successfully πππ
Thank you so much!!!!!
